body:
> as I don't want to accidentally get it to merge this before these last tiny bits of feedback are addressed.

Good call. Bors actually does the merging and doesn't understand r+wc. So had you told it r+, it would have done exactly what you feared. I've updates the docs, so I think this is good to go now.

bors r= @gijsk, @georgf
